<a name="Fv"></a>
## func [Fv](<https://github.com/cinar/indicator/blob/master/valuation/fv.go#L12>)

```go
func Fv(pv, rate float64, years int) float64
```

Fv calculates the Future Value \(FV\) of a Present Value \(PV\).

```
Formula: FV = PV * (1 + rate)^years
```
